attributes.action: Call a full public investigation into the Pakistani grooming and rape gangs.
attributes.additional_details: We want all those involved brought to justice and sacked from any position they may still hold. Prison sentences where required. Followed by the deportation of any perpetrators that are of foreign or mixed nationality. We want justice.
attributes.background: We want the government to fully investigate and publish the findings of,  the Pakistani grooming and rape gangs that have been operating in this country and, the failures of the establishment and police involved .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
